long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Property Insights Assistant: Real-Time Property Information at Your Fingertips!

Looking to get instant, detailed insights about properties while browsing? Property Insights Assistant simplifies your real estate research by allowing you to quickly scrape property data and get answers to your specific questions—all within your browser. Whether you're curious about price history, nearby amenities, or square footage, this extension is designed to save you time and provide reliable information.

Key Features:
- Instant Property Data: Scrape detailed property information with a single click.
- Ask Questions in Real-Time: Type in your queries to receive quick, accurate answers about any property.
- User-Friendly Interface: Simple and intuitive design for effortless use.
- Comprehensive Property Insights: From listing details to price changes, get all the essential info in one place.
- Perfect for Buyers & Agents: Whether you're browsing for your next home or assisting clients, this tool makes real estate research fast and easy.

Install now and take control of your property research with the ultimate Chrome extension for real estate!
